entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Arm64: Add back the annotation in JitDisasm with the local var (+offset) #84504
    8.0.0
  • Unable to compile mono arm64 with clang12 #84503
  • [NativeAOT] Mach-O shared library has a hard-coded identification name under LC_ID_DYLIB #84500
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should warn on protected methods #84499
  • Increased memory consumption after upgrading to .NET 7 #84497
  • [wasm-mt] Land the webworker JSImport support #84489
    8.0.0
  • Default values for init-only properties are lost with generated JsonTypeInfo #84484
    8.0.0
  • IPAddress.TryFormat returns false erroneously for shorter IP addresses #84482
    8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Hybrid.WASM.Tests SIGSEGV failure on iOS #84477
  • IOptions<T> should support getting named options #84478
    Future
  • [NETSDKE2E] With .NET 8.0 Preview4, debugging does not work normally on Mac X64 #84466
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Possible perf improvements in casting #84464
  • Test failure GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen #84462
  • Respect environment variables for disabling Vector support #84461
    8.0.0
  • Do we still need to use REP RET for returns targeted/following after jumps? #84456
    Future

Closed

  • Consider adding BBJ_EHFAULTRET #84307
    8.0.0
  • Docker Container: running c# on linux arm32 #78108
  • Can not access GlobalSystemMediaTransportControlsSessionManager in Windows 11 while running as service #84293
  • JIT: GTF_GLOB_REF set unnecessarily on some local field accesses #856
    Future
  • JIT: Reconsider setting GTF_GLOB_REF in gtNewFieldRef #74563
    8.0.0
  • Test merged baseservices/threading time out in gcstress #83961
    8.0.0
  • Profiling, profile-guided optimization, and deoptimization #7235
    Future
  • WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ServiceCanStopItself fails in CI #84438
  • Configuration of UseCookies via ConfigurePrimaryHttpMessageHandler for Typed Http Clients is ignored #82932
  • dynamic with RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException #84406
  • [NativeAOT] Consider porting/sharing CastCache form CoreClr #75111
    Future
  • Test failure Tests.System.TimeProviderTests.TestProviderTimer #84236
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Opt out of jitstress for profiler/multiple test #84507
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Disable enabledisable test for GCStress #84506
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • DRAFT: testing/measuring cctor change #84502
    needs-area-label
  • Apply the TimeProvider design feedback #84501
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Updating the JIT to support Narrow, WidenLower, and WidenUpper for Vector512 #84498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration to release/7.0 #84495
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    area-Threading-mono
  • Write linker script for lld to enable gc-sections #84493
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] add internal WebWorkerEventLoop utility class #84492
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Split PortableThreadPool.WorkerThread start and loop body #84490
    area-System.Threading
  • Mark tasks projects as non-source projects #84488
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on IPAddress and IPNetwork #84487
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add SPMI benchmarks run collections for tiered and tiered pgo #84483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][sgen] Fix GetTotalMemory #84480
    area-GC-mono
  • OnBeforeBuild delegate to invoke actions just before building the ServiceProvider #84479
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Disable HardwareIntrinsics failing tests on Mono #84475
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.x
  • Improve allocations in ReflectionXmlSerializationWriter when serializing primitive types #84474
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #84471
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono] [RISC-V] re-implement floating point arithmetic without r4fp #84470
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, TimeOnly, TimeSpan, Char, Rune #84469
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Resolve ILLink warnings in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #84468
    area-System.Security
  • [draft] Completely replace GArray by dn_vector_t in Mono #84465
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Ensure loops respect dominators #84458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Introduce BBJ_EHFAULTRET #84467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Strip public keyword from managedToNative stub #84496
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Derived Interface support in ComInterfaceGenerator #84271
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix typo in build instructions for libraries #84485
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][sgen] Remove more dead code #84476
    area-GC-mono
  • JIT: Avoid unnecessary GTF_GLOB_REFs #84349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use a tuned ConcurrentDictionary in the default caching implementation for the COM source generator #84335
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add a test for warning behavior of Requires on type with a const field #84452
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Make service wait on its state before stopping #84447
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono] Fix build error due to undeclared identifier 'llvm' #84473
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` compare #84249
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Mitigation for #84446: comment out problematic JIT assertion check #84449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Shrink hello world by 3.2% #84463
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.6
  • [manual] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #84460
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #84459
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [NativeAOT] Using the same CastCache implementation as in CoreClr #84430
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part2 (down-level support) #84235
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: scalable profile counter mode #84427
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add support to inline the field access of primitive types marked with TLS #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add config binder generator to ASP.NET Core transport pack #84436
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Simplify target to enable config binding src generator and rename enabling property #84379
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Perform ldr to ldp peephole optimization #84399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Obsolete most of the remaining legacy serialization APIs #84383
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Testmerging jit64 #83151
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Allow removal of HWIntrinsic nodes that do not have side effects #84110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avx512 arithmetic #84429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-GC-coreclr
  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Added containment support for `shlx`, `sarx`, `shrx` #84453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve regex compiler / source generator for sets #84370
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.16 #84342
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.5 #84341
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Add a (disabled) prototype for a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable AVX-512 in Memmove unrolling #84348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement locale native functions #84417
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • add msquic to debug runtime on macOS #84181
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Move COM source generator APIs to System.Runtime.InteropServices.dll #84329
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • Reenable VectorLookup tests for mono. #84330
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Update CodeAnalysis.src.globalconfig #84059
    area-Meta
  • Tell coverlet to respect the [DoesNotReturn] attribute for coverage purposes #84396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Re-enable test #84419
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part (backport #84413) #84442
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Annotate XslCompiledTransform as RequiresDynamicCode. #84426
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix type initialization ordering under R2R #84275
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Mark the return type of the JsonSerializer.GetTypeInfo method as nullable. #84411
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #84432
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Add TextWriter.FlushAsync(CancellationToken) #84325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
